SELECT d.*,DATE_FORMAT(d.CREATE_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime FROM yuyue_jpush d WHERE 1=1 and d.id = #{id} and d.msgTitle like concat('%', #{msgTitle}, '%') and d.extras = #{extras}
and DATE_FORMAT(d.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(d.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY d.CREATE_TIME desc
